article: the international monetary fund ' s managing director dominique strauss-kahn will visit africa from march # , to discuss opportunities and challenges facing african economies in the wake of the global crisis , according to a statement released by the fund thursday .
abstract: imf chief to visit africa for dialogue on its economic challenges
